title: Provides electronic toll collection discounts for certain fuel efficient vehicles
summary: Provides electronic toll collection discounts for certain fuel efficient vehicles.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2646

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 27, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sens.  GRISANTI,  MARCELLINO  --  read twice and ordered
         printed, and when printed to be committed to the Committee  on  Trans-
         portation

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the public authorities law, in relation to providing
         electronic toll collection discounts for certain fuel efficient  vehi-
         cles

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The public authorities law  is  amended  by  adding  a  new
    2  section 388 to read as follows:
    3    S  388.  GREEN  E-ZPASS  DISCOUNT. 1. ANY PERSON WHO HAS AN ELECTRONIC
    4  TOLL COLLECTION SYSTEM ACCOUNT WITH THE AUTHORITY SHALL  RECEIVE  A  TEN
    5  PERCENT  DISCOUNT  ON  TOLLS INCURRED ON NEW YORK STATE TOLL ROADS FOR A
    6  MOTOR VEHICLE WHICH HAS A HIGHWAY MPG  FUEL  EFFICIENCY  OF  THIRTY-FIVE
    7  MILES  PER  GALLON OR HIGHER. SUCH DISCOUNT SHALL BE KNOWN AS THE "GREEN
    8  E-ZPASS DISCOUNT".
    9    2. AS USED IN THIS SECTION, THE FOLLOWING TERMS SHALL HAVE THE FOLLOW-
   10  ING MEANINGS:
   11    A. "ELECTRONIC TOLL COLLECTION SYSTEM" SHALL MEAN A SYSTEM OF COLLECT-
   12  ING TOLLS OR CHARGES WHICH IS CAPABLE OF CHARGING AN ACCOUNT HOLDER  THE
   13  APPROPRIATE  TOLL OR CHARGE BY TRANSMISSION OF INFORMATION FROM AN ELEC-
   14  TRONIC DEVICE ON A MOTOR VEHICLE TO THE TOLL LANE, WHICH INFORMATION  IS
   15  USED TO CHARGE THE ACCOUNT THE APPROPRIATE TOLL OR CHARGE; AND
   16    B.  "HIGHWAY  MPG  FUEL EFFICIENCY" MEANS THE HIGHWAY MILES PER GALLON
   17  FUEL EFFICIENCY ESTIMATE PROVIDED BY AUTOMOBILE MANUFACTURERS AND PRINT-
   18  ED ON THE FUEL ECONOMY LABEL AFFIXED TO A WINDOW ON A NEW MOTOR  VEHICLE
   19  PURSUANT   TO   THE  REGULATIONS  OF  THE  UNITED  STATES  ENVIRONMENTAL
   20  PROTECTION AGENCY (40 CFR 600 ET.SEQ.).
   21    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
   22  it shall have become a law. Effective immediately, the addition,  amend-
   23  ment and/or repeal of any rule or regulation necessary for the implemen-
   24  tation  of  this  act on its effective date is authorized to be made and
   25  completed on or before such date.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07344-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing electronic toll collection discounts for certain fuel efficient vehicles
